description: This file defines a LightningJS component named 'Loader' that displays a loading animation with three animated circles. It manages its own state and uses lifecycle hooks to start an interval-based animation.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a loading indicator with animated circles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval that toggles the 'alpha' state to animate the opacity of the circles repeatedly.
